Table of Contents

Class EdgeShape

Namespace
Alis.Core.Physic.Collision.Shapes
Assembly
Alis.dll

A line segment (edge) shape. These can be connected in chains or loops to other edge shapes. Edges created independently are two-sided and do no provide smooth movement across junctions.

public class EdgeShape : AShape

EdgeShape(Vector2, Vector2)

Create a new EdgeShape with the specified start and end. This edge supports two-sided collision.
